name: Test 101
description:
after you woke up in this Laboratory, Try to escape it while discovering it's secrets

-Move with Arrows or WASD

-Sorry for the bugs (it's my first game)

-if you're stuck, jump and move at the same time. 

-This game was made for Untitled Game Jam #32

Tools Used:

Art made with Aseprite

Music made with Cakewalk

 Sounds from freesounds.com

Thanks For Playing :)
